hadiths.text: The tradition mentioned above has also been transmitted by Ibn 'Umar through different chain of narrators from the Prophet (ﷺ). This version adds:They searched for it but could not find it. 'Uthman then fashioned a signet-ring and engraved on it "Muhammad, the Messenger of Allah". He used to wear it or stamp with it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي اتِّخَاذِ الْخَاتَمِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Reported About Using A Ring
